name: ceptre
description: I want to build a multiplayer game based around the [Ceptre](https://github.com/chrisamaphone/interactive-lp) linear logic language, by [Chris Martens](https://www.csc.ncsu.edu/people/crmarten). I'm no researcher -- just a web developer, not even a game designer. So I'm going to write up what I learn.
